changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cards ( cardholder_name, card_brand, last_digits_card_number, expiry_date, address_line1, address_line2, address_postcode, address_city, address_county, address_country, charge_id ) SELECT ch.cardholder_name, ch.card_brand, ch.last_digits_card_number, ch.expiry_date, ch.address_line1, ch.address_line2, ch.address_postcode, ch.address_city, ch.address_county, ch.address_country, ch.id FROM charges ch LEFT JOIN cards c ON c.charge_id = ch.id WHERE c.charge_id IS NULL AND ( ch.cardholder_name IS NOT NULL OR ch.card_brand IS NOT NULL OR ch.last_digits_card_number IS NOT NULL OR ch.expiry_date IS NOT NULL OR ch.address_line1 IS NOT NULL OR ch.address_postcode IS NOT NULL OR ch.address_city IS NOT NULL OR ch.address_country IS NOT NULL );

INSERT INTO payment_requests ( amount, return_url, gateway_account_id, description, reference, created_date, external_id ) SELECT ch.amount, ch.return_url, ch.gateway_account_id, ch.description, ch.reference, ch.created_date, ch.external_id FROM charges ch LEFT JOIN payment_requests p ON p.external_id = ch.external_id WHERE p.external_id IS NULL;

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO transactions ( payment_request_id, gateway_transaction_id, amount, status, operation ) SELECT pr.id, ch.gateway_transaction_id, ch.amount, REPLACE(ch.status, ' ', '_'), 'CHARGE' -- use all PaymentRequest FROM payment_requests pr -- use all ChargeTransaction and fill missing one from PaymentRequest with null LEFT JOIN transactions t ON pr.id = t.payment_request_id AND t.operation='CHARGE' -- use only Charge that has a PaymentRequest JOIN charges ch ON pr.external_id = ch.external_id -- use only PaymentRequest that don't have a ChargeTransaction WHERE t.id IS NULL -- use only Charge in final states, to avoid those in transit AND ch.status IN ( 'EXPIRED', 'EXPIRE CANCEL FAILED', 'AUTHORISATION ABORTED', 'AUTHORISATION CANCELLED', 'AUTHORISATION ERROR', 'AUTHORISATION UNEXPECTED ERROR', 'AUTHORISATION TIMEOUT', 'AUTHORISATION REJECTED', 'USER CANCELLED', 'USER CANCEL ERROR', 'CAPTURED', 'CAPTURE ERROR', 'SYSTEM CANCELLED', 'SYSTEM CANCEL ERROR' );

changeSet.sql: UPDATE transactions t2 SET status = a.status FROM ( -- do an inner select to get only the ChargeTransaction from the required time frame SELECT -- transform charge status into transaction status REPLACE(ch.status, ' ', '_') AS status, -- keep the id of ChargeTransaction for later matching when updating t.id AS id -- use all PaymentRequest to map to Charge FROM payment_requests pr -- use ChargeTransaction only JOIN transactions t ON pr.id = t.payment_request_id AND t.operation='CHARGE' -- use Charge that maps to a PaymentRequest JOIN charges ch ON pr.external_id = ch.external_id -- use only Charge from 2017-11-15 between 3-4pm WHERE ch.created_date > '2017-11-15 15:00:00' AND ch.created_date < '2017-11-15 16:00:00') a -- match ChargeTransaction for update WHERE t2.id = a.id;
